controller module¶

class controller.Controller¶

Bases: object

Class for manipulating keys and encrypting/decrypting files.

Parameters

  • private_key (RSA private key (RSA.RsaKey) or None) – Current private key.

  • public_key (RSA public key (RSA.RsaKey) or None) – Current public key.

decrypt(data_path, output_path)¶

Decrypt a file.

Parameters

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to decrypt.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

Returns

True if output_path isn’t empty, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

encrypt(encModeStr, data_path, output_path)¶

Encrypt a file.

Parameters

  • encModeStr (str) – Chaining mode to use for encryption e.g. ‘CBC’.

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to encrypt.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

Returns

True if output_path isn’t empty, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

generate_keys(public_path, private_path, password)¶

Generate private key and public key.

This method generates both private and public keys and stores them as files and in appropriate fields.

Parameters

  • public_path (str) – Path to file for public key.

  • private_path (str) – Path to file for private key.

  • password (str) – Password for encrypting private key. If password is empty, then private key will not be encrypted.

Returns

True if neither public or private path were empty, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

load_private(private_path, password)¶

Load private key from file.

Parameters

  • private_path (str) – Path to file with private key.

  • password (str or None) – Password for decrypting private key.

Returns

Private key object if successfully loaded, None otherwise.

Return type

RSA private key (RSA.RsaKey) or None

load_public(public_path)¶

Load public key from file.

Parameters

public_path (str) – Path to file with public key.

Returns

Public key object if successfully loaded, None otherwise.

Return type

RSA public key (RSA.RsaKey) or None
